oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tintype of Sgt. Rufus Daniel Lawson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Tintype of Sgt. Rufus Daniel Lawson. He was from Bedford County, Tenn., or Vermont, but he was raised in Bedford County. He died of smallpox in Nashville at the end of the war on March 31, 1865. A pension record from October 1865, was filed by his wife, Sallie Givens Lawson. Rufus Daniel Lawson was in Co. E, 10th Tenn. Vols., USA.
